source_node.video_title: Global Spyware Scandal: Exposing Pegasus Part One (full documentary) | FRONTLINE
source_node.context: The potential use of Pegasus against figures like Jamal Khashoggi, who was killed in 2018, highlights the severe real-world implications of this technology for privacy, human rights, and democratic processes.
